pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick wall / floor / stairs texture from a pre-set list on inspector

content.raw:
Thanks, this is really taking more time than it should.

I found where the problem lies, not sure how to fix it though. I just realized that setting texture to the floor from the inspector is the only time when texture is set to something and that thing is not fully opaque. When setting it for walls and stairs from the inspector, they are usually selected and thus opaque. But if you open a wall inspector, then deselect the wall, then change the texture on the inspector, the same problem as the floor occurs.

So I guess it's a matter of making sure we `Set3dTransparency` after `Set3dTexture` has been completed.
